text.registry: Create a new registry or move an existing one

clone_dialog.title: Clone Registry
clone_dialog.label: Registry name
clone_dialog.description:
The questionnaire, settings and access rights to the registry are transferred to the draft registry.
The registry is cloned without transferring companies and applications.

users_dialog.title: Access settings
users_dialog.info: Access to the “{{value}}” is available to:

error.title: The folder cannot be deleted
error.info: The "{{value}}" folder contains objects. Move the items to a different folder and repeat the action.

users.empty: Add groups and configure item permissions
users.no_rights: The employee is not assigned access rights to the registries

permissions_dialog.no_rights: The employee does not have access to the Registry module. Setting permissions will be available after providing access by the company administrator
permissions_dialog.no_permissions: The available permissions for the group are not assigned. Contact the head of the department
permissions_dialog.allowed_permissions: The list is limited by the allowed group permissions

1.title: View companies
1.description: View the list of companies included in the register
